author: Simon Difford
description: Ginger and orange are delicately spiced with clove-forward falernum and fortified with golden rum.
name: Messianic Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
